fullText: The musical Tootsie, which opened Thursday at the Marquis Theatre, is a show that knows exactly what it wants to be: a crowd-pleasing, old-fashioned Broadway entertainment that doesn't worry too much about the gender politics that have made its source material increasingly problematic.
